sentence: The only other Georgian to speak during primetime was Herschel Walker, the former University of Georgia and professional football player, a longtime friend of Trumps, who also strongly defended him.
title: Georgians At The RNC: An Entirely Different Republican Strategy

sentence: A spokeswoman for Herschel Walker blamed Warnock and President Joe Biden for inflationary pressures driving up the prices across the economy.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: OPINION: The radical liberal Raphael Warnock we were warned about has not materialized

sentence: If the election were today, Senator Warnock could be destined for defeat against Football Star Herschel Walker, the almost certain nominee for the GOP.
title: Can Raphael Warnock win Georgia a Second Time?

sentence: Republican Herschel Walker has surged ahead of Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock in the high-profile Georgia U.S. Senate contest, according to a poll released Wednesday.
author: Valerie Richardson
title: Herschel Walker opens up lead over Raphael Warnock in Georgia Senate poll

sentence: Warnock, who was found trailing GOP challenger Herschel Walker in a recent poll, asked the Fulton County court jointly with his ex-wife Ouleye Ndoye to make the records of their divorce and custody battle over their two children unavailable to the public.
author: Virginia Aabram
title: Embattled Democratic Sen. Warnock and ex-wife file to seal custody battle record

sentence: Former football star Herschel Walker, the GOP frontrunner, ended 2021 with roughly $5 million in the bank.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Warnock sets another fundraising record, ends quarter with $25.6M in the bank

sentence: But the National Right to Life Committee is endorsing Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, who has been outspoken in his support to outlaw abortion as he runs this year to challenge Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock of Georgia in a crucial Senate showdown that could determine whether the GOP wins back the chamber's majority.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia Senate race: Herschel Walker lands endorsement of leading anti-abortion group

sentence: The microtargeting project, which is likely the most expansive and detailed survey conducted in Georgia so far this cycle, shows the dominant position that Herschel Walker maintains over Raphael Warnock in the race for the U.S. Senate, Republican pollster Blaise Hazelwood wrote in a memorandum for 34N22, the super PAC supporting Walkers Senate bid.
author: David M. Drucker
title: GOP candidate Walker leads Democratic Sen. Warnock in Georgia Senate race: Poll

sentence: Democratic Senator Raphael Warnock looks as if he's headed for a tough race to defend his Georgia seat against GOP contender Herschel Walker in November's midterm.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Raphael Warnock's Chances of Beating Herschel Walker, According to Polls

sentence: Hes expected to face former NFL player Herschel Walker in the general election.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Warnock easily secures Democratic Senate nomination in Georgia

sentence: Democratic U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock will face Republican football legend Herschel Walker for a coveted Senate seat in Georgia after both handily defeated primary challengers on Tuesday to set up a historic, high-stakes showdown.
title: Georgia US Senate race will pit Warnock against Walker
